title: Stock Futures Muted Ahead of Bank Earnings
sub_head: Citigroup, JPMorgan Chase and Wells Fargo are set to post earnings ahead of the opening bell
body:
Treasury yields rose, while stock futures were little changed, as earnings season ramped up and investors awaited fresh data on retail spending.
Futures for the S&P 500 ticked up 0.1% Friday. A decline in technology stocks dragged down major stock indexes Thursday. Contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 edged down 0.1%, and futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average added 0.2% Friday.
